item.title: How To Put Together The Perfect Team
item.description: In today’s fast-paced business environment, many teams are forced to work in virtual spaces. In this article, we will look at the characteristics of productive teams, the challenges facing virtual teams and how to overcome them. Characteristics of productive teamsWhen building a team, you need to think about the characteristics of productive teams. You can’t just grab people in different departments and expect them to work together. You need to have a sense of purpose, as well as efficient communication between your employees.

item.title: Head of Remote - Here's what you need to know
item.description: Head of Remote - Here’s what you need to know No one has to tell you that the world is changing. With this shift in working styles, companies are looking for new ways to lead their employees from a distance.
